alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 11:02AM EST until January 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow expected. Additional Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches through this afternoon. Total snow accumulations have reached 5 to 14 inches across the area. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Schuyler, Steuben, Yates, Seneca and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While some drier air has reduced snow coverage, steadier snowfall is expected this afternoon as the low moves east of the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 5 1 1 from within the state.

area.areaDesc: Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Yates
